animeDescription: The story revolves around a girl named Yuuka, who encounters a being from the depths of the Earth named Chii-chan (a pun of chiteijin, the Japanese word for underground-dweller), and an alien named Ucchan (a pun of uchuujin or alien). The story follows their heartwarming and chaotic everyday lives together.
animeVoices: ['Murakawa, Rie', 'Nagae, Rika', 'Kurose, Yuuko', 'Asakura, Momo', 'Natsukawa, Shiina', 'Satou, Arise']
animeStaff: [['Ikezoe Takahiro', ['Director', 'Episode Director', 'Storyboard']], ['Tanaka Kazuya', ['Sound Director']], ['Tomatsu Haruka', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Toyosaki Aki', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
